summary: A module that resizes input tensors (typically images) to a target spatial size, supporting explicit height‑width specifications or scaling based on a chosen side (short, long, vertical, horizontal). It offers multiple interpolation algorithms, optional corner alignment, and antialiasing for down‑sampling to preserve visual quality.
business_intent: Enable flexible and high‑quality image resizing within deep‑learning preprocessing workflows, ensuring consistent tensor dimensions for downstream models.
